sentences.base_language: I am a very famous music artist
sentences.target_language: Soy un artista de música muy famoso

sentences.base_language: I sang at the super bowl
Do you want to learn one of my songs?
Aunti asked me if I have so many girlfriends
sentences.target_language: Tití me preguntó si tengo muchas novias

sentences.base_language: Today I have one, tomorrow I'll have another, eh
sentences.target_language: Hoy tengo una, mañana otra, eh

sentences.base_language: hey, but there’s no wedding, there’s no wedding, auntie
sentences.target_language: ey, pero no boda, no boda, tití

sentences.base_language: I’m going to take them all to the V.I.P., the V.I.P., hey
sentences.target_language: Me las voy a llevar a todas pa un V.I.P., un V.I.P.

sentences.base_language: Let’s take a selfie, "say cheese," hey
sentences.target_language: Vamo a tirarno un selfi, "say cheese," ey

sentences.base_language: Let the ones I already slept with smile
sentences.target_language: Que sonrían las que ya conmigo durmieron

sentences.base_language: In a V.I.P., a V.I.P., hey
